hac

Class StartServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • hac.StartServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(name="StartServlet",
            urlPatterns="/StartServlet",
            initParams=@WebInitParam(name="fileName",value="poll.txt"))
public class StartServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    main section Eran Safadel ex2 this program is survey for users and shows the qes and ans for the survey the program first of all reads data from file and save them on Context after that show the result of survey to client
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
